data.name: ZOMBALL
data.description:
In ZOMBALL you play as a survivor in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Instead of using guns or other weapons, you must use your athletic skills to defend yourself by throwing various sports balls at the approaching zombies.  You can be a lethal PITCHER or QUARTERBACK. The game is fast-paced and action-packed, requiring quick reflexes and good aim to take down the zombies before they get too close. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter increasingly challenging waves and levels of zombies, youâ€™ll also be able to unlock new sports balls to use as weapons, each with its own unique abilities and properties. Despite its intense gameplay, ZOMBALL is not a horror game and is suitable for players ages 13 and up. In fact, it's Subtle workout trap providing an exciting and engaging way to get some "tricked into" physical activity. The game will have in final release ability for multiplayer, allowing you to team up with friends and family to take on the zombie hordes together. Just watch out not to hit your fans by mistake. Go Ballistic IN ZOMBALL ! 

More levels / sports and player request's from reviews coming soon!
Co-op , multiplayer and and Editor are all planned for full release!
